Package edu.iu.jrsalata

Class SicStatementBuilder

java.lang.Object
edu.iu.jrsalata.AbstractStatementBuilder
edu.iu.jrsalata.SicStatementBuilder
public class SicStatementBuilder extends AbstractStatementBuilder
The SicStatementBuilder class is responsible for processing and creating SIC statements from a given string. It extends the AbstractStatementBuilder class and provides specific implementations for handling SIC assembly language statements.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • processStatement

      public void processStatement(String statement) throws InvalidAssemblyFileException, ScriptException
      Processes a given assembly statement.
      Specified by:
      processStatement in class AbstractStatementBuilder
      Parameters:
      statement - The assembly statement to process.
      Throws:
      InvalidAssemblyFileException - If the statement contains an invalid mnemonic or format.
      ScriptException - If there is an error in evaluating expressions within the statement.
